title: Amy Poehler | How Trump and Kushner Failed on Testing and Ventilators: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump essentially abdicating his responsibility to handle the coronavirus pandemic.

Then, he catches up with his pal Amy Poehler. They chat and then say REALLY!?! to Mitch McConnell.
